title: Prepare a Closing Binder for an M&A Deal
description: After an M&A deal has closed, a corporate paralegal needs to assemble a 'closing binder' with all the final, executed deal documents.

tasks.description: Gather all final, signed versions of the deal documents (e.g., Purchase Agreement, Disclosure Schedules, officer certificates).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all the necessary documents.

tasks.description: Organize the documents in a logical order and create a table of contents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent structures the binder in a clear and organized way.

tasks.description: Compile all documents into a single, indexed PDF to be shared with the client and other parties.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces the final electronic closing binder.
